events.name: iSpawnedCounter
events.comment: Count number of instruments spawned during gameplay.

events.name: iPickedCounter
events.comment: Count number of the same instrument picked by the player.

events.name: iPicked
events.comment: Save the last instrument picked by the player

events.name: tutorial
events.comment: Is the player seeing the tutorial?

events.name: gameplayMode
events.comment: Is the game currently on gameplay mode?

events.name: lightsCycle
events.comment: Current cycle position of the lights

actions.text: After the dictionary is loaded, the game is ready to play.

parameters.text:
"You are the manager of a rock band that currently has no musicians. Your goal is to have the best bassist, drummer, guitarist, and keyboardist on the band.

At any point in the game, press [color=#ffff00]\[Space][/color] to start collecting instruments. To recruit or upgrade a musician, you need to collect 3 of the same type of instrument in a row. Each musician has 2 levels, and the drummer starts at level 1.

Press [color=#ffff00]\[Space][/color] to continue..."

actions.text: Show fader, and hide status message.

children.text: If player got 3 of the same instrument in a sequence, increase its complexity.

children.functionDescription: If player got 3 of the same instrument in a sequence, increase its complexity

children.text: All the instruments being at their maximum level of complexity means that the band is fully upgraded.

parameters.text: "[color=#00ff00]Band is fully upgraded! Press [/color]\[Space][color=#00ff00] to restart...[/color]"

actions.text: If there is an instrument to upgrade, perform the upgrade.
Bring musicians platforms and Maestro on stage.

children.text: Check if player collided with an Instrument shape.
Player picked an empty instrument cube, therefore reset counter to zero.
Player picked up the same type of instrument they just acquired. Add to instrument counter.
If the player has picked 3 instruments of the same time, go back to the show.
Player picked up a different kind of instrument. Reset counter and set newly picked instrument type.
Shuffle light sequence every full cycle.
